tool.name: ERGA Assembly Reporting Tool (EAR)
tool.description: A tool to compile Assembly reports and stastics from assembly pipeline tools and produces a summarized PDF report

configfiles.configfile:

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
**ERGA Assembly Reporting Tool (EAR)** is a tool that compiles various statistics and reports generated from Assembly pipeline tools and compiles them in to a summarized PDF document for reporting.
